text: phu sraththa thanghlay! Næ nx nxallxh ca thrng thdsxb phwk cea dwy sing hnung xan dikæ satw la thi mux khxng phwk cea di man ma læa hxk khxng phwk cea dwy pheux xallxh ca thrng ru wa khır thi yakerng phraxngkh nı sphaph thi khea mi hen phraxngkh læw phu dı lameid hlangcak nan khea k ca di rab thosʹ xan cebsæb
